description:
It’s real, “Supergirl” and “Arrow” have crossed paths and nothing could be more exciting. “Arrow” star Stephen Amell shared the photo of himself suited up as the Green Arrow, side by side with “Supergirl’s” Melissa Benoist in all her red-caped glory.号外号外，不能再激动了，《超级少女》和《绿箭侠》真的有交叉剧集。《绿箭侠》饰演者，史蒂芬艾美尔，分享了一张他和《超级少女》梅利莎拜诺伊斯特穿着各自在剧中的服装的图片。

Throwing “Supergirl” into the mix makes for what is already a very interesting 100th episode of “Arrow.” Amell previously shared photos of Deathstroke (Manu Bennett) and a mystery character on set for filming. While it’s entirely possible Benoist was the mystery person Amell was keeping a secret, chances are there are a number of surprises in store for episode 100.当然“超级少女”和“绿箭侠”的这第100集的交叉剧集真的很有意思。艾美尔首先分享了正在拍摄的丧钟（马努贝内特）还有一个神秘角色。是否拜诺伊斯特是不是那个神秘角色呢？艾美尔十分保密，在第100集一定有很大的惊喜在等着。

 “Arrow” episode 100 — which is part of the annual crossover — is in production now. The Season 5 premiere of “Arrow” is Wednesday, Oct. 5 at 8 p.m. ET/PT on The CW.《绿箭侠》第100集还在拍摄中。《绿箭侠》第五季将在10月5日周三晚八点在CW首播。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 《超级少女》与《绿箭侠》交叉剧集精彩预告！
